messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Elegant Summer Fat Camp Three, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Elegant Summer Fat Camp Three door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
